alert.note: Alert for Buncombe; Macon; Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 9:27PM EST until January 07 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of up to a half inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Buncombe, Southern Jackson, Macon and Northern Jackson Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Valley locations will only see a dusting of snow this evening. Bitterly cold wind chills, below zero, will occur in high elevations Friday morning.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. Please report snow and ice accumulations by calling the National Weather Service toll free at...1...800...2 6 7...8 1 0 1. Leave a message with your observation and the specific location where it occurred. You can also post your report to National Weather Service Greenville Spartanburg Facebook or tweet your report using hashtag nwsgsp. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or your favorite source of weather information for the latest updates. Additional details can be found at www.weather.gov/gsp. The latest state road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Buncombe; Macon; Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson
